argumentText:
ARGUMENT
b w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscms.1 | |- X = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | iscms.2 | |- D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` w ) e. _V |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( w = M -> ( Base ` w ) e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = M -> ( dist ` w ) = ( dist ` M ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( dist ` w ) = ( dist ` M ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( b = ( Base ` w ) -> b = ( Base ` w ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = M -> ( Base ` w ) = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = M -> ( Base ` w ) = X ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> b = X ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( b X. b ) = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_reseq12d | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( ( dist ` w ) |` ( b X. b ) ) = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( ( dist ` w ) |` ( b X. b ) ) = D ) |
| 14 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( CMet ` b ) = ( CMet ` X ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( ( w = M /\ b = ( Base ` w ) ) -> ( ( ( dist ` w ) |` ( b X. b ) ) e. ( CMet ` b ) <-> D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_sbcied | |- ( w = M -> ( [. ( Base ` w ) / b ]. ( ( dist ` w ) |` ( b X. b ) ) e. ( CMet ` b ) <-> D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_df-cms | |- CMetSp = { w e. MetSp | [. ( Base ` w ) / b ]. ( ( dist ` w ) |` ( b X. b ) ) e. ( CMet ` b ) } |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( M e. CMetSp <-> ( M e. MetSp /\ D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
